title: Mojo working: Jimi Hendrix 1942-1970
creator_credit: Mark Neale, Alan Douglas, Christopher Mould, Screen Ventures, Initial (GB) and Gravity
brief_description: Part of the television documentary series “The Making of modern music”. Features live performance footage of Jimi Hendrix and personal commentary by various musicians, writers and critics in the music industry including Keith Le Blanc, Jaz Coleman, P.P. Arnold, Afrika Bambaata, Melanie Williams, John “Rhino” Edwards (Status Quo) and others. Songs include Purple haze, Johnny B Goode, Red house, The Wind cries Mary, Voodoo Chile, Wild thing. “Mojo working” is made up edited excerpts from original films by D.A. Pennebaker, Peter Neal, Peter Pilafian, Jean Peller/John Seay.
